content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 46, "index": 14}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 26}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 29}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 61, "index": 30}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 37, "index": 41}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 58, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a polished_blackstone_pressure_plate, I need to place 2 polished_blackstone side by side in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move a polished_blackstone from slot 32 into the crafting table at slot 1.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 46, "index": 14}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 26}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 29}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 61, "index": 30}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 37, "index": 41}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 58, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that there is one polished_blackstone in slot 1, I will move another one to slot 2, which is adjacent to slot 1.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 46, "index": 14}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 26}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 29}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 61, "index": 30}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 37, "index": 41}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 58, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that the polished_blackstone_pressure_plate has been crafted, I will move it from slot 0 to slot 12, which is an empty slot in my inventory.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
